description:
On her way home from school, Ayumi sees Makabe carrying the unconscious body of his wife Yuri to his car. Believing the young married woman she sometimes visited was murdered by her husband, Ayumi and the Detective Boys return to the house to investigate. They are confronted by Makabe while they are looking around the yard. When they ask him where his wife is, he answers that she is in the mountains. Conan and his friends also question a deliveryman who says he heard someone scream in the house the day before. Convinced that murder is a real possibility, they enter the house using a spare key and find a mysterious doll that was not there before as well as dried blood on the floor...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le secret de la jeune épouse disparue
The Secret of the Missing Young Lady
